perfectly+generic object.description: An item that is completely and totally generic.
perfectly+generic object.creator: ebolite

completely+useless object.description: An item that is absolutely useless. Yes, this is a challenge.
completely+useless object.creator: ebolite

captchalogue card.description: An empty captchalogue card... contained in another captchalogue card.
captchalogue card.creator: ebolite

pre-punched card.description: A captchalogue card that has been rendered useless due to being punched by a punch designix. Has the code of another item on it.
pre-punched card.creator: ebolite

punched card.description: A captchalogue card that has been rendered useless due to being punched by a punch designix. Has the code of another item on it.
punched card.creator: ebolite

cruxite dowel.description: A dowel made of some material called Cruxite. Can be carved with a Totem Lathe.
cruxite dowel.creator: ebolite

entry item.description: A cruxite item that allows you to enter the Medium.
entry item.creator: ebolite

punch designix.description: A game abstraction used for punching codes onto captchalogue cards.
punch designix.creator: ebolite

cruxtruder.description: A game abstraction used for creating cruxite dowels.
cruxtruder.creator: ebolite

sealed cruxtruder.description: A game abstraction used for creating cruxite dowels.
sealed cruxtruder.creator: ebolite

totem lathe.description: A game abstraction used for carving cruxite dowels with punched cards.
totem lathe.creator: ebolite

alchemiter.description: A game abstraction used for alchemizing new items from codes engraved into dowels.
alchemiter.creator: ebolite

gristTorrent disc.description: You're like the Robin Hood of stealing shit from your friends.
gristTorrent disc.creator: ebolite

Sburb disc.description: A CD containing a cool new game called SBURB. You should find a computer and install this puppy. You can't wait to play this game with your friends.
Sburb disc.creator: ebolite

lap top.description: A portable computing device. Quite useful.
lap top.creator: ebolite

desktop computer.description: A large computer setup. Inconvenient to carry around, but still possible with the help of your Sylladex.
desktop computer.creator: ebolite

pizza cutter.description: A sharp kitchen utensil used for slicing pizzas.
pizza cutter.creator: ebolite

baseball bat.description: A wooden bat made for hitting high-velocity balls.

aluminum bat.description: An aluminum bat made for hitting high-velocity balls.
aluminum bat.creator: ebolite

rolling pin.description: A rolling pin used for flattening dough.

plunger.description: A plunger used for unclogging toilets.
plunger.creator: ebolite

scissors.description: A pair of scissors used for cutting paper.
scissors.creator: ebolite

shears.description: A large pair of shears, used for shearing wool and plants.
shears.creator: ebolite

safety scissors.description: A pair of scissors specially made to prevent the user from harming themselves.
safety scissors.creator: ebolite

pepper spray.description: A can of self-defense. Useful for dissuading criminals and predators.
pepper spray.creator: ebolite

chainsaw.description: A saw used for cutting trees. Very terrifying.

crowbar.description: A crowbar used for opening doors and crates.
crowbar.creator: ebolite

halligan bar.description: A large crowbar used for prying doors off of cars.

broom.description: A standard broom used for sweeping operations.
broom.creator: ebolite

straw broom.description: A broom made of straw. Looks like something a witch would fly on.
straw broom.creator: ebolite

spear.description: A large spear that's made for fighting.
spear.creator: ebolite

ice pick.description: A scary-looking pick that's used for clinging to ice.

golf club.description: A club used for hitting golf balls. Formidable as a weapon.

hammer.description: A standard claw hammer used for beating nails.
hammer.creator: ebolite

sledge hammer.description: A large hammer used for demolition. Does a lot of damage if it hits.

rubber mallet.description: This is a toy hammer, not a proper rubber mallet... It's a mallet made entirely of rubber.
rubber mallet.creator: ebolite

jump rope.description: A standard rope used for jumping over.
jump rope.creator: ebolite

piano wire.description: Thin wire for use as piano strings. Can be used to effectively strangulate targets.

shovel.description: A hefty shovel used for digging.
shovel.creator: ebolite

hatchet.description: A small hatchet. Makes a formidable weapon.
hatchet.creator: ebolite

axe.description: A sturdy axe used for chopping trees. It's a powerful weapon.

fire axe.description: A fireman's axe. This is a very powerful weapon and tool.

wooden spoon.description: A wooden spoon used for cooking.

stun gun.description: A self-defense implement used for non-lethally disarming opponents.

basketball.description: A standard ball used for shooting hoops.

football.description: A football. But what kind of football?

dodgeball.description: A menacing ball used for pelting little kids.

bowling ball.description: A heavy ball that's traditionally used to knock down pins.

rake.description: A tool used for turning leaves on the ground into leaves in a pile.

wooden plank.creator: ebolite

brass knuckles.description: A pair of heavy knuckles that gives a bit more *oomph* to your punches.
brass knuckles.creator: ebolite

sap.description: A weighted leather implement that you can strap around your hand.
sap.creator: ebolite

caestus.description: A studded leather glove that can be used to punch down your foes.

mittens.description: A pair of movement-hindering mittens. They're quite warm, though.

gloves.description: Some snug-fitting gloves that keep your hands warm.
gloves.creator: ebolite

silver fork.description: A piece of silverware used for piercing food and moving it to the user's mouth.

pitch fork.description: A three-pronged device used for handling hay. Also makes a decent improvised weapon.

table.description: A piece of furniture that you put other things on.

couch.description: A couch. A truly beautiful invention.

manga.description: A book of right-to-left drawings that tells a story.

sord.description: A... sord? You're not exactly sure what this thing is.

gaming computer.description: A large computer setup. It's tricked out.

clown shoes.description: A pair of large clown shoes.

clown nose.description: A lovely red clown nose. Squeeze it for a surprise.

clown poster.description: A poster of a clown that bears a striking resemblance to Bill Cosby.

red faygo.description: A bottle of red cherry Faygo cola.

top hat.description: A hat for a distinguished gentleman.
top hat.creator: ebolite

dated rifle.description: An old rifle known for the distinctive ping it makes when reloading. This particular one is fitted with a bayonet.

banana.description: It sure would be a shame if you misplaced the peel after eating this superfood.
banana.creator: bec

azure grimoire.description: A shapeshifting grimoire said to be capable of practically anything. Makes for a sweet arm prosthetic.
azure grimoire.creator: bec

bleach bottle.description: A cleaning agent that's inedible despite the suggestions of pranksters on the internet.
bleach bottle.creator: bec

deer skull.description: A deer skull you managed to get your hands on. Gnarly, AND ghastly!
deer skull.creator: Sky

ghost pepper.description: The famous one million scoville Chili Pepper. Be sure to turn on a camera before eating.
ghost pepper.creator: bec

blender.description: A basic blender, with the ability to spin, and blend. Shocker.
blender.creator: Sky

scarf.description: Comfy, nicely woven, and decently long- pretty nice quality.
scarf.creator: Sky

pet rock.description: Your loyal petrock. Won't ever leave your side.

stone.description: Like a rock, but with a bit more oomph to it.
stone.creator: bec

boulder.description: A massive rock. How you managed to fit it through the front door is the wonder of all your friends.

football helmet.description: Football helmet, simple as that. You wear it, and play football.
